ComicInfo.Title: Reed Gunther & the Steak Snacking Snake!
ComicInfo.Summary: The bear-riding cowboy returns in full-color! The previously self-published all-ages indie book by the Houghton brothers gets the Image treatment. In the exciting first issue, follow Reed Gunther and his trusty grizzly bear steed, Sterling, as they bumble their way through battling one of the wild west's most ferocious creatures: a giant, cow-hungry snake!
